# Clear project structure and workflow

.pull-left[
```{r echo=FALSE}
path <- c(
    "project/doc/manuscript.Rmd",
    "project/doc/notes.Rmd",
    "project/doc/requirement.Rmd",
    "project/data/data.csv", 
    "project/R/read_input_function.R", 
    "project/R/read_input_function.R",
    "project/code/configuration.R", 
    "project/output/summary_statistics.csv",
    "project/output/figure.jpeg",
    "project/doc/manuscript.Rmd",
    "project/doc/notes.Rmd"
)

x <- lapply(strsplit(path, "/"), function(z) as.data.frame(t(z)))
x <- rbind.fill(x)
x$pathString <- apply(x, 1, function(x) paste(trimws(na.omit(x)), collapse="/"))
(mytree <- data.tree::as.Node(x))
```
]

# Version control system
"A system that records changes to a file or a set of files over time so that you can recall specicif  versions later"

- Revert selected files back to a previous state
- Revert the entire project back to a previous state
- Compare changes over time
- Git and GitHub

.pull-left[
